Package Offer

Class HolidayOffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Offer.Offer
      • Offer.HolidayOffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HolidayOffer
extends Offer
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class which implements a holiday offer, by adding an end date and a total price to Offer.
    Author:
    Javier Delgado del Cerro, Javier Lopez Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • HolidayOffer

        public HolidayOffer(double deposit,
                    java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                    RegisteredUser host,
                    House house,
                    java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                    double totalPrice)
             throws DateRangeException
        Constructor of the HolidayOffer class.
        Parameters:
        deposit - double with the money the offer's deposit costs.
        startDate - LocalDate which indicates when the offer starts.
        host - RegisteredUser who creates the offer.
        house - House in which the offer takes place.
        endDate - LocalDate which indicates when the offer ends.
        totalPrice - double with the total price the offer costs.
        Throws:
        DateRangeException - if the start date is after the end date.

    • Method Detail

      • setEndDate

        public void setEndDate(java.time.LocalDate d)
                throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Setter of the offer's ending date in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
        Parameters:
        d - LocalDate with the new offer's ending date.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - If the offer is not waiting to be changed.

      • setTotalPrice

        public void setTotalPrice(double t)
                   throws NotAvailableOfferException
        Setter of the offer's total price date in case the administrator asks for changes on the offer.
        Parameters:
        t - double with the new offer's total price.
        Throws:
        NotAvailableOfferException - If the offer is not waiting to be changed.

      • commissions

        public double commissions()
        Return the commissions an offer has. For holiday offers is 2% of the offer total price.
        Specified by:
        commissions in class Offer
        Returns:
        double of the offer commissions.
